alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 7:39PM CDT until June 07 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, minor flooding of low lying agricultural lands begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Sunday was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is currently cresting, and will fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 PM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 12.8 Sun 7 PM 11.9 11.5 11.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday evening at 945 PM CDT.
